name: Chef Goose
description:
In Chef Goose, you'll play as a... Goose! You'll use your hot boiled knife to slice down the dangerous and bouncy yellow spheres, WOW!

Features:
  • %100 procedurally animated GOOSE!
  • Amazingly deep NECK MECHANICS!
  • Brutal COMBAT!
  • Discover a vast not OPEN WORLD!
Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys: Move

Left Mouse Button (Hold): Control Neck Vertically

Right Mouse Button (Hold): Control Neck Horizontally

Left/Right Mouse Button (Hold): Pick Up Knife

Mouse: Swing Your Neck!

Credits:

This game is made for Global Game Jam 2022 @ Sweden Game Arena Skövde: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/titled-goose-game-0

Yigit Doruk - Designer & Developer

Emma Holm - 3D Artist
